name: Button's Garden
description:
“Deep in the woods, where the moss grows thickest and sun barely reaches the forest floor, there lived two goblins. Button and her wife lead a simple life. Being a humble Mushroom Tender and a Baker, they did not want for much… until the Dark Lord Plonko rose in the west.

His tendril-like influence spread throughout the land. Where once there was peace and simple pleasures, now there was only fear and conflict.

The skills of Button and her wife did not escape the capricious gaze of Plonko. Only having time to grab a few precious keepsakes, they were quickly captured and taken to the Dark Lord’s lair, and forced to grow mushrooms… for evil!”

This was most of the teams first attempt at a Ludum Dare, and for some of us our first stab at game development!
